title: Red Receives a Mysterious Invitation
summary: Little Red Riding Hood is approached by her mother, who hands her a letter from her grandmother requesting a visit. Red is told to deliver a basket of treats, but her mother warns her to avoid the forest path. Red, curious about the invitation's urgency, decides to take the shortcut through the woods despite her mother's warning.

title: Red Encounters the Charming Stranger
summary: While taking the forest shortcut, Red is stopped by a mysterious and handsome young man named Wolfe, who offers to escort her. Red hesitates but agrees after Wolfe reveals he knows a safer, quicker route. Red and Wolfe exchange flirtatious banter as they walk, but Wolfe secretly plans to reach Grandmother's house first.

title: Wolfe Outpaces Red to Grandmother's House
summary: Wolfe distracts Red by pointing out wildflowers and encouraging her to gather some for her grandmother. As Red is occupied, Wolfe races ahead and arrives at Grandmother's house, convincing her to play along in a ruse to surprise Red. Grandmother, amused, agrees to hide in the closet while Wolfe dons her shawl.

title: Red Arrives and Confronts Wolfe
summary: Red arrives at the house and immediately senses something is off with her 'grandmother.' She questions Wolfe in disguise, leading to a playful but pointed exchange as she tries to expose his identity. When Red pulls off Wolfe's hood, he confesses and explains his intentions were to spend more time with her.

title: Grandmother Reveals Her Matchmaking Scheme
summary: Grandmother bursts out of the closet, laughing, and reveals she orchestrated the entire setup after noticing the mutual affection between Red and Wolfe in the village. She encourages them to be honest about their feelings. Red and Wolfe, now aware of their own and each other's motivations, agree to give their budding romance a chance.

title: Red and Wolfe Choose Each Other
summary: After sharing a heartfelt conversation about trust, Red decides to forgive Wolfe for the deception, and Wolfe promises to always be honest. Grandmother gives her blessing and invites them to stay for tea. The trio celebrates, marking the beginning of Red and Wolfe's romantic relationship.
